20101223063726.000|20101223063726.000|CC1|YEARS.                          
20101223063726.000|20101223063727.000|CC1|[LAUGHTER]                      
20101223063727.000|20101223063729.000|CC1|SEEMS WE'RE AT AN IMPASSE.      
20101223063729.000|20101223063731.000|CC1|WHEN ALL HOPE WAS LOST, A       
20101223063731.000|20101223063731.000|CC1|BREAKTHROUGH.                   
20101223063731.000|20101223063732.000|CC1|>> THE PRESIDENT AND            
20101223063732.000|20101223063733.000|CC1|CONGRESSIONAL LEADERS HAVE      
20101223063733.000|20101223063735.000|CC1|REACHED AN AGREEMENT ON TAX
